mapper.select: select * from m_goods left join m_goods_category on m_goods.goods_category_id = m_goods_category.goods_category_id where goods_id = #{goodsId}
mapper.insert: insert into m_goods (goods_id, goods_name, goods_description, price, goods_category_id, service_url) values (NEXTVAL('goods_seq'), #{goodsName}, #{goodsDescription}, #{price}, #{goodsCategoryId}, #{serviceURL})
mapper.update: update m_goods set goods_name = #{goodsName}, goods_description = #{goodsDescription}, price = #{price}, goods_category_id = #{goodsCategoryId}, service_url = #{serviceURL} where goods_id = #{goodsId}
